title: Harry of Monmouth
description: From book cover:The story of Henry V, the soldier-king who forged England's greatness.One of the most exciting historical novels ever written, 'Monmouth Harry' has for its background the turbulent, lusty days of the early 15th century. Out of the savagery and splendour of those times looms Henry V, warrior and lover, who set his nation on the path to glory.
author: A.M. Maughan
